summary: This document is a collection of sign-in sheets for mandatory quarterly Special Housing Unit (SHU) training at a correctional facility for Quarter #3 of 2019, spanning from June 9 to September 7. The sheets are standard prison administration forms, indicating routine staff training procedures during the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.

events.title: Quarterly SHU Training Period
events.description: Mandatory quarterly training for Special Housing Unit staff was scheduled and conducted.

keyFacts: The document is a routine prison administrative record for staff training in the Special Housing Unit (SHU).
It covers Quarter #3 of 2019 (June 9 to September 7), a period during which Jeffrey Epstein was in federal custody.
The forms are standard PS 5500.14 Attachment E sign-in sheets, indicating procedural compliance.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text; all name fields appear to be blank or contain placeholder text/initials.
The document itself does not contain any direct references to Epstein, his case, or specific events related to him.
